node.display_long_description:
NEW SLOTS TOURNAMENTS UPDATE!

PokerStars, the world’s leading poker brand, has combined live and online poker in a truly immersive VR experience.

-Study your opponents, pick up on their tells, and chat in real time
-Handle your chips and cards, just as you would at a real-world poker table
-Keep the table fun with interactive props and toys, summoned in an instant

This is the most exciting poker game on the planet, and there’s a seat open for you right now.

- Key Features -

-Authentic poker, blackjack & slots action
-A fully immersive, social experience
-Simple, intuitive, easy to play
-Play real opponents
-Realistic physics, from cards and chips to balloons, pistols and more
-Unlock free chips every day
-Certified RNG

- Exotic locales -

-Medieval Castle
-Cyber Apartment
-Evil Volcano Lair
-Macau 2050
-The Galaxy Space Station
-Macau Suite
-The Showdown Saloon
-The Monte-Carlo Yacht
-The Void

nodes.title: Slots Tournament Update!
nodes.body_text:
Hey everyone we have another great update for you here with [Patch 70] featuring all-new SLOTS TOURNAMENTS that we're launching with a limited-time chip sale going on now!

Check out the new Slots Tournaments sub-tab in the watch menu to register for and launch a tournament!

We're launching 2 new slots tournament Discord leader boards #slots-tlb-weekly #slots-tlb-monthly with exclusive items for the TLB winners.

You can check out the daily Slots Tournament schedule and payouts on our Discord in #slots-tournament-schedule

New Features
- Slots Tournaments

Bug FIxes
- Fix for spin and go mission win hands tracking as play hands
- Fix for cash bust players mission not tracking
- Fix for cash bet/raise chips mission not tracking when player all ins
- Updated Maraca Audio & Removed Auto Spawning

Join us on Discord

nodes.title: The Big Game Update!
nodes.body_text:
Hey PokerStars VR players we have a new update for you with [Patch 59] now live for download!

This update includes a new sports betting feature on The Big Game this weekend and a brand new Big Game player pack available for purchase.

New Features
- Sports Betting Panel
- Added avatar animation & lipsync to tutorial
- New Fetch Room List for improved game list loading in the lobby
- The Big Game Player Pack

Bug Fixes
- Cards sometimes jumping and auto-folding on Seat 2 in Cyber and Medieval fixed
- Some instances of players seeing grey-cards should be fixed (all saved card skin selections had to be reset)
- Some issues with spin wheel in lobby breaking should be fixed
- Cigar hovering above table fix
- Various spamming error fixes

Join us on Discord

node.reviewDescription:
I’m very confused and disappointed that if someone leaves a poor review on PokerStars, then they are banned from communication for a fixed amount of time.  Why even allow for reviews at that point. Isn’t the whole purpose of reviews so that everyone has a voice. If used properly, it also allows for an open forum for the powers that be to learn from.   How else does any person, business or product better themselves without proper feedback?  If you only wanted to hear the positive, then you should rename “reviews” to “testimonials”. 

The above rant is in reference to my fellow player and now friend VincentVega1111.  He had a legitimate concern about customer service prioritizing player issues based on their bank roll. Vincent articulated very clearly his appreciation and admiration for the developers, but disappointment in customer service.  Right, wrong or indifferent... Vincent has that right to his opinion without being penalized.  I’m not sure if I too will now receive that same penalty, but I feel strongly in right vs wrong and this is wrong.   I hope customer support will reconsider their response to Vincent’s review and banning.

website_page_meta.description:
NEW SLOTS TOURNAMENTS UPDATE!

Step into the future with this game-changing release from the biggest name in the business. Visually stunning environments; realistic chip and card movements; an endless supply of interactive toys, props and accessories; and the world’s best poker software powering multiplayer Texas Hold’em action.
website_page_meta.title: PokerStars VR · Oculus Quest
